sourcesContent:
<form class="lg:w-5/6 sm:w-24 mr-[-0.5rem] lg:mx-auto" [formGroup]="searchForm">
    <input type="search" name="search"
        class=" border-none py-3 placeholder-purple-300 text-blueGray-600 bg-purple-100 rounded text-sm shadow focus:outline-none focus:ring lg:w-full w-24 ease-linear transition-all duration-150"
        placeholder="" style="font-family:FontAwesome" formControlName="search" (keyup.enter)="search()">
</form>
